title: New Mexico Shroud Exhibit and Museum Must Move
post: Thanks Dan.  This is FYI.  If anyone wants to help in any way (if they are in the area or have tax deductible donations to help), they can contact Pete or I (but that’s not why this notice is here).  On the site, the user can click the Deacon Pete or Webmaster link to e-mail us.  Thanks.
author: Andy
